casebody.data:
The Marinette Iron Works Company, Appellant v. Frank Reddaway, Respondent. Decided January 5, 1891. Appeal by plaintiff from order vacating attachment on ground of insufficiency of affidavit upon which attachment was granted. Lewis Sanders, for appellant. Strong & Cadwalader, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Per Curiam.

The order should be affirmed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements.
